title: Not Sure How to Network With High Status Men and Stunning Women? Watch This!
description:
Ready to build a network of amazing women and high-status men?

Michael’s Men of Action is a one-on-one Master’s program that teaches men how to create elite social lives by becoming higher status.

Click this link to learn how you can have a High-Status lifestyle now:
https://m.moamentoring.com/podcast

Click here to join the Men of Action community and watch the High-Status Networking 101 course:
https://m.moamentoring.com/moa-community
———————————————————

Subscribe on Youtube: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/MichaelSartain

Listen on Apple Podcast: 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-michael-sartain-podcast/id1579791157

Listen on Spotify: 
https://open.spotify.com/show/2faAYwvDD9Bvkpwv6umlPO?si=8Q3ak9HnSlKjuChsTXr6YQ&dl_branch=1
caption: false

channel_info.title: Michael Sartain
channel_info.description:
🎙Host of The Michael Sartain Podcast 

🔥Teaching you how to build a network of desirable women and high-status men

👇 Click the "Men of Action" link below now to forge a high-status lifestyle and join the elites

transcription: {"text": "Michael, you're probably one of the best networkers that I've ever seen. If you could refine everything you know into, like, one thing, what would that thing be and why? So the answer is the simple thing. It's the one standard deviation move. It's the boring answer, which is... E equals MC squared. That's not a boring answer. It's how to win friends and influence people. It's people want to hear their own name. You want to create win-win situations for other people. And I treat everyone the same. Like Caitlyn, I say, hey, motherfucker, you want to go to the gym? That's how I talk to Caitlyn. I talk to my guy friends. I'm like, hey, motherfucker, do you want to go to the gym? Yeah, I talk to them exactly the same. Like, the best thing I've ever found as far as networking is getting people to talk about themselves. All the other stuff, the advanced stuff, like break and rapport, the comedy stuff, that comes later. But the main thing that, like, keeps you in the game all the time is when people will talk about themselves vociferously. If you ever watch Lex Friedman or you ever watch Joe Rogan, you'll find there's, like, this actual curiosity. It's not a fake...
